title: 00003 The Greatest Love Sept 07, 2016
description: Through the years, Gloria (Sylvia Sanchez) has become a doting and selfless mother to Amanda (Dimples Romana), Andrei (Matt Evans), Paeng (Arron Villaflor), and Lizelle (Andi Eigenmann). However, a long-kept secret will shatter their once happy family, leading Gloriaâ€™s children to leave her one by one. As Gloria struggles to keep her family together, she starts to show symptoms of dementia and begins to lose pieces of her memory. Her mission â€“ to bring back the love her family once had for each other â€“ becomes even more difficult as she races against time and tries to gather her memories before they are completely wiped out
